casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintel Martinez AUGUSTINE. No. 130A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2004. G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of June 2004 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2004."
